attributes.title: App review

attributes.title: THIS APP PUT ME IN THE ICU!!!! DO NOT GET

attributes.title: trump put the muffins in the freezer
attributes.review: this app is so rude and disgusting. there’s a monster under my bed and even he was scared of this app. it malfunctions far too much and adds unnecessary viruses to my phone. very undeveloped. i wish i could give 0 stars.
